text: Christie Blatchford (May 20, 1951 â€“ February 12, 2020) was a Canadian newspaper columnist, journalist and broadcaster. Notable publications she wrote for include Toronto Sun, National Post and The Globe and Mail. She also published four non-fiction books. She was born in Rouyn-Noranda, Quebec. Blatchford died of lung cancer in Toronto, Ontario on February 12, 2020. She was 68. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Canadian columnists Category:Cancer deaths in Ontario Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Writers from Quebec Category:Writers from Toronto
title: Christie Blatchford
